content.detailedDescription: I began looking at the sky around 9:30 last night, the sky cleared up from the rain so i left my window wide open to look at the stars. at about 10pm, i saw lights blinking towards the west, i thought it was just a plane but it was blinking like a strobe light in the same spot off in the distance for 30 minutes before i decided to take out my telescope. when i pointed it at the blinking lights, my heart literally stopped! i screamed to my boyfriend, who was also amazed by these lights, "that's a f@#%ing spacecraft, dude!" he ran to look through the telescope and was in complete agreement that it was not anything he'd ever seen before! it was a diagonal line of lights, at one end, a steady green light. at the opposite end, there was a steady orangish light - in the middle were 3 erratically blinking white lights and in between the white and orange lights were distinctly smaller red flashing lights. my boyfriend and i were quick to get outside opinions, we yelled for my roommates who were also astonished at the sights of this craft-like object. we all watched for over an hour as this craft slowly hovered from left to right and saw a single orangish orb of light which appeared to dock with this vehicle and quickly drift away. between 11:30 and 12, a large/bright white star-like object was also visible coming from that direction. we all watched as it ever-so-slightly drifted across the sky and over our house. we all ran outside to watch this light drift through the sky and slowly out of sight (northeast). as for the craft-like object, it was visible for about another 30 minutes and was drifting from side to side, which was clearly visible from the telescope and even visible with the naked eye. i was also able to record a video of the flashing lights through the telescope with my phone.
content.summary: Diagonal string of flashing lights hovering in sky - orange orb docks. star-like object drifts across sky.

content.detailedDescription: Myself and a friend where driving on a state road, we were on our way to go cut firewood after getting off work. we saw a dull silver cigar shaped craft appear in front of us about 200 feet away from us in the sky descending in a straight path about 45 degree angle downward towards us at a very slow rate of speed. we both asked each other at the same time ,do you see that? as it got closer i slowed almost to a stop thinking it would hit us, i swerved towards right hand side of the road hoping to avoid contact but just before it got to us it disappeared. we were no more than 20 feet away at that point. the sighting seemed to last about 15 seconds. we saw no visable meens of flight, no wings, no windows, no doors, no welds, no rivets, it was dull and almost a well used silver metal, looked like mercury. we both thought it would hit us or the ground in front of us, but it just simply seemed to vanish before our eyes. the craft was about 60 feet in length and 12 to 15 feet thick. it was a clear day about 4:30 in the afternoon. we both sat there for a few seconds in stunned silence. after arriving at our destination, about 1 mile away we relized it had taken 14 minutes longer to get there than it should have taken. my friend wanted to ask around at farm houses in the area if anyone else had seen the object, but i was a buisness owner in the area and was afraid that may not be the best idea. i do not know what we saw that day, but we were not drinking and were both clear headed at the time. to this day i have never told anyone but my wife about the craft but another odd occurance recently has made me want to report my sighting.
content.summary: Dull silver craft desending no welds or rivets, almost hit my truck. i was with another person and we both saw the object  we had to swerve to avoid contact with craft in broad daylight.

content.detailedDescription: I personally did not wittness anything. but you need to ask nasa for "all" photo graphs of the moon from the apollo missions. from my understanding, (info from a scientist who worked at nasa at the time) there are about 350 photgraphs unpublished and classified that prove alien spacecraft exit.
content.summary: There are about 350 photgraphs unpublished and classified that prove alien spacecraft exit

content.detailedDescription:
I watched this white light sphere come directly from mt. tamalpais towards my backyard,  it changed color to orange red - i took pictures from my iphone - then it turned back into white oval���������
wondering if anyone out there can please check out my pictures and tell me what you think!!!
content.summary: Orange sphere turned into white light

content.detailedDescription:
I watched this white light sphere come directly from mt. tamalpais towards my backyard,  it changed color to orange red - i took pictures from my iphone - then it turned back into white oval���������
wondering if anyone out there can please check out my pictures and tell me what you think!!!
content.summary: Orange sphere turned into white light

content.detailedDescription: I was walking the stupid dog and observed a round white light almost the size of a plane observed from a high altitiude. what caught my eye was three things- first it was larger by about 10 % of a  plane and two- no landing lights and three it was moving slightly slower than a plane. i followed it moving from right to left for about ten seconds when i defintely noticed a shrinkage in size to half its size but not a dimming of its brightness and then it started fading to a dull star and then disappeared. the moon was to my direct right during the sighting and on the same longitude as the object. i can only guess that perhaps the light of the moon may have hit a satellite for a few seconds and that is what i observed.There was no cloud cover for the object to go behind  unless it was high altitude.   i was facing east south east if i had to guess and only looked at phone watch after a minute.
content.summary: Bright light no landing lights change in diameter

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were sitting in our front yard enjoying a nice summer evening when we both noticed a orange-reddish glowing orb coming from the soutwest.My wife spoke first asking if that is a helicopter,i said no i do not see any blinking red and green lights or any sound(i grew up and lived for 27 yrs. less than 2 miles from hopkins international airport and have been observing aircraft my whole life.)the object was on a straight trajectory toward the northwest like a satellite but appeared to be below the clouds.(my wife and i spend many summer evenings observing satellites and have observed the iss and space shuttle and this was much brighter than either).We continued to observe the object travel on it's trajectory until it went behind some clouds, at that point i noticed and brought to my wifes attention that the moon(which was close to full) cast a shadow on the clouds and, the shadow was a perfect circle. at this point my wife and i are trying to figure out what we saw by ruling out all possibilties. my first thought was a satellite because of the straight trajectory, but this was brighter than any satellite either of us have ever seen.Next we thought that possibly it could have been a meteor but i have never seen one that bright that did not have a trail(i have been an amatuer astronomer for over 30yrs. and have observed every astonomical phenomemoan there is).Then i suggested space junk entering the atmosphere but we did not witness any breakup of the object like you would expect from a stallite rentering the atmosphere.My last thought was that it was the spaxex falcon9 coming in for splash down but when i looked it up online i found out that the splash down was 2 days prior.Our only explaination would be a bright satellite we did not know of or an unidentified flying object.
content.summary: Glowing orange reddish orb traveling from the southwest to northeast.

content.detailedDescription: Driving at night headed south on hyway 385 into casa grande az saw light low on horizon ..Wanted to follow it driver refused..Called p.D.Ask if any one had reported sighting a u.F.O.They said no and that was a lie as my friend had called minutes before and reported it...
content.summary: Blimp like straight row of colored lights that went on then off...Slow flight

content.detailedDescription:
Driving home from work at about 2:40 pm eastern time in central north carolina when my eye distracted to a shimmer. i glanced up and saw a plane, but then i looked back because it didn't have wings that i could see. i continued to watch it cross the sky under cloud level. today we have a few fluffy white clouds in the 3000 - 4000 foot range. it was traveling roughly south to north and i was traveling east to west. it was not moving too fast, and its speed seemed to stay consistent. after a min, maybe a little more, it was in the field of view directlt in front of my, when it seemed to darken out. it just kinda went from shiny metallic to a shadow and gone. i continued watching the area for another couple of minutes where i last saw it and the path it was on, but i never noticed it again.

the object itself seemed maybe cigar shape and as it came closer to center of my view, it was more like a cone, wide at the back to a point in the front, front being direction of travel. the wider back seemed to have more reflection than the front. i never did see anything that appeared to be wings or any other identifiable marks. we do have military and personal aircraft in the area frequently, but i don't feel this looked like the planes i'm used to seeing. with the cloud heights and the position of the object, i suspect it was about 1 mile from me line of sight and no bigger that a 737, possibly smaller. commercial flights in this area would typically be much higher.
content.summary: Metallic cone or cigar shape object on straight line path

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in a small parking lot by the entrance of exit 24 of the grand central parkway in queens, nyc speaking on my cellphone when i noticed what looked like the brightest star in the sky start to move very slowly.  at first i thought it was a high flying plane given our proximity to laguardia airport, but the object was a steady white light with no flashing.  shortly after the sighting i noticed a few airplanes do the contrast confirmed at least that this was different.  the bright light moved at a steady pace from west to easy over about 4 minutes, and by that point was over the trees and out of sight.  the object made no noise.  the object seemed too high to be a hellicopter, and was also silent.  at first i thought it was a shooting star (which i remarked on the phonecall) but a slow 4 minute trek over the visible sky seemed a bit off.  perhaps a sattelite of some sort?
content.summary: Bright white orb crosses sky with steady movement

content.detailedDescription: i live about 10 miles outside the fort drum military base.I was outside on my front porch on june 4th 2012 at 10:31 pm and i noticed a light appear low in the sky to my left.The object started moving rather slowly horizontally across the sky from left to right coming from the opposite direction of the military base.Ive seen many military jets and helicopters but i instantly knew this was different than anything ide ever seen.It was meandering up and down as it went,after about a minute of this motion it disappeared and reappeared within a second or two at a much higher altitude.It repeated this process 4-5 times getting higher and higher until it disappeared all together.There was absalutely no noise and after looking closer at the photo i took with my cellphone it appears to have 4 sides and a dark center.The clouds appear to be illuminated by the object in a rather large area.
content.summary: Strange light about 10 miles from fort drum military base

content.detailedDescription: I had just bought a telescope and was  carrying it outside to check out stars...The starts were not yet out but it takes time to set the scope up so i was doing so. my friends were sitting on the patio and i was out in the lot. i looked up and about 500 feet above me i saw a still hovering  craft with four lights in equal distance from each other in a square shape. they were very very bright ...So bright that they reflected off of the underside of the craft which to me looked like a pyramid.(hard to explain) but i could see up inside the underneath of the craft because its lights were reflecting off the surfaces.  i yelled at my friends to come look  at this ufo   they laughed and said  oh  right.. it started to move in a straight path north in a slow  but steady motion  no sound at all. i screamed no  come here guys look...By the time my buddy got to me  he too saw the craft with 4 lights  it was moving north   and then  still in line of site   just vanished  completely.  we thought it was so strange because it was dusk  and the moon was rising and it was not  dark. we could see well beyond the craft into the distance....But the craft  literally disappeared (not turned off lights if it had done that  we still would have seen the craft)  it was gone.   last week may 2012  i saw  on the news  lights above missouri  and saw the video footage   and immediately recognized the square 4 lights as the same  lights i saw on october 15 2011.  i know i saw a ufo  i know i'm not crazy i now know others seen it too.
content.summary: Pyramid (square bottom)shaped with 4  bright lights on bottom corner edge

content.detailedDescription: Working delivery notice something like fire in the sky maybe a meteor. but no it was moving slower and slower than two smaller firey object seem to fall off and drop to earth. had to wake up from looking at it i was stopped on roadway and began recording. larger fire moved across sky and got smaller intill it looked as a star and my next blink it was gone.
content.summary: fire in the sky
